title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
After gathering feedback for Folders and Search in Scene Navigation, I've made some modifications:

  • Setting to enable click to view scene in scenes directory.
  • Added folder tree to the navigation. You can now go back and forth between subfolders.
  • Some users did not understand that 'Favorites' was Foundry's default navigation. I changed back the naming and icon.
  • Retained folder list open/closed state in same session (resets on reload)

Keep the feedback coming! More on Github repo or Discord
